title: runtime: test timeout during ./all.bash on BananaPro
body:
```
su
Load: 0.05, 0.10, 0.13 - Board: 50.8°C - Drive: 40°C / 1.5Tb - Memory: 828Mb
uname  -a
Linux bananapi 4.1.2-bananapi #30 SMP Sun Jul 12 07:03:27 CEST 2015 armv7l armv7l armv7l GNU/Linux
```
I downloaded go 1.4.2 from http://dave.cheney.net/unofficial-arm-tarballs
and when I compile 1.5, test timeout.

```
$ export GOOS=linux
$ export GOARCH=arm
$ export GOARM=7
$ env GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP=/home/go1.4 ./all.bash
```
